data.message: Em is like the Blue and Black dress: I don't understand how some people can't see he's the greatest.

replies.message: Whatever, my point was Marshall is the best.
Just like Eminem White and Gold
He's not the best. He admits it himself.

That is called being humble. But music isn't about being the best. Music is about expression and having fun. Being creative. It's cool when it's extremely technical of course, but that's not an absolute importance. Point is rap, being music as well, is not a competition as a lot of people seem to think.

René, you are right when it comes to most types of music. Thing is, in Hip-Hop, there actually IS competition between rappers. It's part of the game, that's why some artists beef with each other sometimes and rappers always say they're better than others. In Hip-Hop, competition is necessary because it's a rebellious youthful and it's combat music. And even if there was no competition, we as fans and listeners, can still say ''I prefer this one, or this one'' and argue by pointing facts.
Lol its funny cuz the dress is blue and black
Am the only one around who read that rapin'?
